title: User Defined Action UDRs - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: It is possible to define an Action UDR and send it from the Collection workflow, in a ConsumeCycleUDR , to communicate actions back to the forwarding workflow. The UDR can be sent regardless of the Send Reply over Bridge setting in the Workflow Bridge profile.

chunks.text: It is possible to define an Action UDR and send it from the Collection workflow, in a ConsumeCycleUDR , to communicate actions back to the forwarding workflow. The UDR can be sent regardless of the Send Reply over Bridge setting in the Workflow Bridge profile.
